poem:
### In Defense of the Earth

Vandals, they name  
those who stain the glass  
with cries of a warming world.  
Eighteen moons of silence  
for a smear of truth  
upon the canvas of art.  
Justice, a heavy pendulum,  
swings wide,  
yet misses its mark,  
our voices silenced  
by bars and time.  
The earth weeps red.
